Project Gradient Folders

Gradients make your life better: fact. So here's a set of over 50 handcrafted, artisan project-specific gradient folders + a bonus TypeScript folder for your computer system so you can live your best life.

Frameworks
Languages
Applications

Icons Are Important

Research has shown that icons, when used correctly, can enhance usability, be easily remembered, and improve the design of the webpages or software being used.

Folders with Icons

As a communication tool, icons can be used in web design to support text content or in replacement of it where possible. Icons are a way to communicate visual language by using widely recognised images – in fact, the strength of these images lies in its ability to transcend culture and language.

Support Your Projects

As long as care and consideration is taken, icons can be a fantastic way of representing ideas into one succinct entity.

Folders without Icons

Not a web developer? Just a fan of gradients? Like to just randomly download things? That's fine. I got you covered!

Instructions for Mac

  1. Download the icon set you want above, or all of the Mac icons here.
  2. Unzip the icon set (this should make a folder. Icons are in .png format).
  3. Open the icon you want to set your folder to and copy it 
    4. ctrl + c
  4. Right-click on the folder you want to customize and select "Get Info".
  5. Click on the icon to the left of the folder name in this view, and paste it 
    ctrl + v

There's more information in this article.

Instructions for Windows

  1. Download the icon set you want above, or all of the Windows icons here.
  2. Unzip the icon set (this should make a folder. Icons are in .ico format).
  3. Right-click on the folder you want to customize and select “Properties”.
  4. Under the “customize” tab, go to the “Folder icon” section, click on “Change icon” button.
  5. Select the icon you would like to replace it with.
  6. Save and you're done!

There's more information in this article.
